resources.string: Wow, this is a text fragment!

string-array.name: f1_drivers_description
string-array.item: Seven-time World Champion, known for speed, consistency, and advocacy for diversity.
Reigning World Champion, aggressive driving style, and known for exceptional racecraft.
Talented young driver from Monaco, known for raw speed and qualifying performances.
Spanish driver known for consistency and ability to extract the maximum from the car.
Mexican driver known for tire management and race strategy, often referred to as the "tyre whisperer."
Promising British driver known for impressive performances in both qualifying and races.
Two-time World Champion, known for tenacity, racecraft, and vast experience.
British driver known for speed, sense of humor, and strong performances at McLaren.
French driver known for resilience and strong defensive driving skills.
French driver known for comeback after being demoted from Red Bull to AlphaTauri, where first win was scored.
Finnish driver known for smooth driving style and strong performances in qualifying.
Chinese driver known for being the first full-time F1 driver from China, showing promise in rookie season.
Japanese driver known for aggressive driving and quick adaptation to F1.
Highly-rated Australian rookie with an impressive junior career, known for technical prowess and speed.
Danish driver known for aggressive driving style and strong racecraft.
German driver known for experience and consistent performances, often filling in as a super-sub.
Thai-British driver known for strong racecraft and adaptability, having returned to F1 after a year out.
American rookie showing promise with a strong junior career, looking to make a mark in F1.
Canadian driver known for speed and occasional strong performances, supported by father\'s investment in the team.
Dutch driver known for versatility across different racing series and late entry into F1.
